Eta, Sleepy Artificer ISK
UR 1UR 3 Legendary Creature - Seven-Shadows Creature 1/3
2 {3}, {T}: Copy target creature or artifact spell an opponent controls. If you copy a creature spell this way, it becomes an artifact in addition to its other types. At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token copy of an artifact you control that has the same name as a permanent an opponent controls. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Eminence in Shadow ISK
UBR 3UBR 6 Legendary Creature - Human Rogue Creature 5/5
2 Eminence — As long as Shadow is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you can’t cast spells from your hand. Each nonland card in your hand has foretell. Its foretell cost is equal to its mana cost. Double strike, Flying, Trample, Ward {1} When Shadow enters destroy all nonland permanents you control. Then if Shadow was cast from the command zone, for each creature destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on Shadow, and for each other permanent destroyed this way, create a treasure token. Treasure Token
Alpha, Cold Leader ISK
UBR 3UBR 6 Legendary Creature - Elf Seven-Shadows Creature 5/5
2 First strike, Flying Whenever Alpha attacks, you may exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a Seven-Shadow’s card. You may put that card onto the battlefield tapped under your control. Put the rest back on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Beta, Plagarist Author ISK
UB 1UB 3 Legendary Creature - Elf Seven-Shadows Creature 5/4
2 Secret Agent Beta can’t attack or block. At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top two cards of your library face down, then draw a card and you lose 2 life. 2UUBB: Gain control of Beta. Only Beta’s owner may activate this ability. Betrayal — Whenever Beta’s owner gains control of Beta, they may play any number of cards from among cards exiled with Beta without paying their mana costs. Beta loses all abilities.

2 {1}, Sacrifice another nontoken permanent: Target opponent may return the sacrificed permanent from a graveyard to the battlefield under their control. Create a number of tapped treasure tokens equal to 1 plus the number of permanents you own that your opponents control. Activate only as a sorcery. XXUU: Gain control of target nonland permanent with mana value X or less. Spend only mana produced by Treasures to pay for X. Treasure Token Treasure Token
